title: 15 Wishes for a Better Customer Experience When Flying
excerpt: From instant loyalty points to smarter disruption handling, Ann Cederhall's wish list captures what travelers actually want from airlines.
author: Retailaer
content:
From our reading list: This is exactly why we do what we do at Retailaer. Ann Cederhall's wish list isn't revolutionary—as she points out, these are "basic user-centric design principles travelers expect from every other industry." The gap between airline self-perception and customer reality is precisely what modern offer and order management can solve.

The Disconnect

Ann cites research showing 75% of companies believe they're customer-centric, yet only 30% of customers agree. This disconnect is especially pronounced in airlines.

The 15 Wishes

  1. Frequent Flyer Validation: Allow validation of FF numbers before booking to see point earnings potential
  2. Immediate Point Credits: Provide instant post-flight point accrual notifications
  3. Group Seating Management: Enable adding colleagues and family to reservations for coordinated seating
  4. Pre-Flight Menu Access: Display onboard menus and sales options in the airline app prior to departure
  5. Partner Airline Services: Extend all purchasable offerings to codeshare partner bookings
  6. Flexible Cancellation Products: Offer straightforward "cancel for any reason" options
  7. Waitlist Upgrades: Allow paid access to earlier flight waitlists
  8. Swift Refunds: Process refunds quickly; credit digital wallets for small amounts
  9. Travel Agent Integration: Seamlessly connect airline and travel seller app experiences
  10. Broad Compatibility: Eliminate "airline website only" restrictions
  11. Airport Experience Intelligence: Send pre-arrival messages with real-time info
  12. Baggage Transparency: Offer smart tracker options and online baggage issue reporting
  13. Personalized Disruption Support: Provide actionable alternatives during delays/cancellations
  14. Group Travel Flexibility: Remove arbitrary nine-passenger group booking thresholds
  15. Destination Inspiration: Create wish-list features for travel aspiration curation

These aren't pie-in-the-sky demands. They're table stakes in 2025.
